subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Joba Chamberlain lost for the first time since June 18, on a day when Derek Jeter broke the record for hits by a shortstop. The loss was just the second for the Yankees in their past 14 games.
snippet: Joba Chamberlain lost for the first time since June 18, on a day when Derek Jeter broke the record for hits by a shortstop. The loss was just the second for the Yankees in their past 14 games.
